definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: This study probed into the mechanism of cross-language syntactic priming.
sentences.chinese: 本研究考察跨语言句法启动及其机制。

sentences.english: Contrastive study of syntax structure of yes-no questions in Russian and Chinese is made in part two.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是俄汉语是非问句的句法结构对比研究。

sentences.english: One important syntactic function of preposition phrases is to be the adverbial before subject.
sentences.chinese: 作句首状语是部分介词短语的重要句法功能。

sentences.english: The semantic representation of topic structure is mapped onto syntax by GFT interface.
sentences.chinese: 主题结构的语义通过语法功能层界面影射到句法。

sentences.english: Chapter three discusses some problems of SVS in syntactic dimension.
sentences.chinese: 第三章论述连动句的句法平面中的若干问题。

sentences.english: VRC is a syntax structure consists of a verb and its resultative complement.
sentences.chinese: 动结式”是指动词带表示结果的补语组成的句法结构。

sentences.english: In chapter five, the relation between metonymy and syntax is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第五章讨论了转喻同句法的关系。

sentences.english: In syntactic formation both of them have strong syntagmatic and syntactic function.
sentences.chinese: 句法形式方面两者具有较强的组合能力与句法功能。

sentences.english: In syntactic formation both of them have strong syntagmatic and syntactic function.
sentences.chinese: 句法形式方面两者具有较强的组合能力与句法功能。

sentences.english: The strong or weak nature of attribute of the attribute location noun spatiality is related to sentence structure.
sentences.chinese: 定语句法位置名词空间性的强弱与定语的性质有关。

sentences.english: The author summarizes three particular properties of this kind of sentence in syntactic and semantic aspects.
sentences.chinese: 文章分析了花园幽径句的三个句法语义特性。

sentences.english: There are large differences on linguistic properties of syntax between Chinese and some Indo-European languages like German.
sentences.chinese: 汉语与德语等印欧语言在句法特性上有很大差别。

sentences.english: Syntax trees only represent the lexical and syntactic structure of the source code.
sentences.chinese: 语法树只能够表现出源代码的词法和句法结构。

sentences.english: Sub-category features belonged to syntactic properties.
sentences.chinese: 子语类特征属于句法特征。

definition: rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
antithesis (two lines of poetry matching in sense and sound)/to fight/to wage war
forms of versification/conventions regarding set number of words and lines, choice of tonal patterns and rhyme schemes for various types of Classical Chinese poetic composition/metrical verse
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
level and oblique tones (technical term for Classical Chinese rhythmic poetry)
